titles.title: No Man Can Sing This Song That I Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No man can sing this song that I sing.
No man can walk this narrow way,
But those in the Christ caught up in glory
The sing this song in a living way.
I'll sing this song through the ages.
I'll walk this way upon the earth,
That those that see will magnify
And those that hear will praise His name.
